summary: Leaderboard & Competitions feature testing complete. All backend APIs working correctly (100% pass rate). Frontend Leaderboard.jsx page properly implemented with tabs for categories, weekly challenges, score breakdown. Navigation updated with 'Compete' link using Flame icon.

GET /api/leaderboard?category=pet - Filter by pet XP works (200 OK)
GET /api/leaderboard?category=achievements - Filter by achievements works (200 OK)
Score formula validation - training*10 + achievements*5 + pet_xp + referrals*15 verified
Navigation has 'Compete' item with Flame icon at /leaderboard
Leaderboard.jsx has correct UI components (tabs, weekly challenges, score breakdown)
Protected route correctly redirects unauthenticated users to landing page

context_for_next_testing_agent: Leaderboard and Competitions features fully implemented and tested. Backend endpoints /api/leaderboard (public), /api/leaderboard/my-rank (auth), /api/competitions/challenges (auth), /api/competitions/claim/{id} (auth) all working. Frontend Leaderboard.jsx with 4 category tabs, weekly challenges section with progress bars and claim buttons, podium display for top 3, and score breakdown. Navigation has 'Compete' item with Flame icon. Authentication required for personalized features (my-rank, challenges, claim).
